org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.components.FCM.util

Interface IMappingRule

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITemplateMappingRule

    public interface IMappingRule
    Interface used by extension point for evaluation of interface mappings

    • Method Detail

      • calcDerivedType

        org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Type calcDerivedType(Port p,
                                          boolean update)
        Calculate the derived portType
        Parameters:
        p - the port
        update - if true, make model updates during calculation of derived interface
        Returns:
        the list of provided interfaces

      • needsUpdate

        boolean needsUpdate(Port p)
        check whether a port needs to be updated (recalculation of its derived interfaces)
        Returns:
        true, if update is required, false otherwise
